issues.title: Hardcoded URL
issues.description: The API endpoint URL ('https://localhost:8000/api/prompt') is hardcoded. This makes the code less flexible and harder to deploy to different environments.

issues.title: Missing Error Handling
issues.description: The code lacks error handling.  If the `axios.post` request fails, the application might crash or behave unexpectedly.  A `try...catch` block should be implemented to handle potential errors.

issues.title: Unspecified `formDataToSend`
issues.description: The code doesn't show how `formDataToSend` is created or validated.  Ensuring the correct data format and handling potential issues with `formDataToSend` is crucial.

feedback: The code snippet has some critical issues regarding error handling and flexibility.  Addressing the hardcoded URL and adding error handling are essential for robust application behavior.  Clarifying how `formDataToSend` is constructed would improve code clarity and maintainability.
